definition: eminent beyond or above comparison, a flat disk of chocolate covered with beads of colored sugar
details:
adjective
- eminent beyond or above comparison
= synonyms: one, one and only, peerless, unmatched, unmatchable, unrivalled, unrivaled, matchless
noun
- a flat disk of chocolate covered with beads of colored sugar
- colored beads of sugar used as a topping on e.g. candies and cookies
- model of excellence or perfection of a kind
= synonyms: apotheosis
